metadata.title: CVE-2020-27841 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: There's a flaw in openjpeg in versions prior to 2.4.0 insrc/lib/openjp2/pi.c. When an attacker is able to provide crafted input tobe processed by the openjpeg encoder, this could cause an out-of-boundsread. The greatest impact from this flaw is to application availability.

criterions.comment: insighttoolkit4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
blender: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
